CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Due_Date__c), "", IF(Due_Date__c < TODAY(), "Past Due", IF(Due_Date__c - TODAY() >= 0 && Due_Date__c - TODAY() <= 7, "Due in 7 Days", IF(Due_Date__c - TODAY() > 7 && Due_Date__c - TODAY() <= 15, "Due in 15 Days", IF(Due_Date__c - TODAY() > 15 && Due_Date__c - TODAY() <= 30, "Due in 30 Days", "Due in 30+Days")))))
CustomField.label: Due In
